text: Privacy Policy
Version update date: March 5, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Version Effective Date: March 5, 2022

Shenzhen Yixian Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "We") is an operator of the primary and secondary school network cloud platform (hereinafter referred to as "APP").For better services, we will use and disclose your personal information in accordance with the provisions of this privacy protection policy. We know the importance of personal information to you and we will do our best to protect your personal information security and reliable.

This privacy protection policy explains how to collect, use your personal information, and help you understand your rights. Before using our services, carefully read and understand the privacy protection policy.
[Special Tips] Please read the "Privacy Protection Policy" (especially the content of bold and line) and determine our personal information processing rules.

During the reading and use process, if you have any questions, you can contact our customer service consultation. If you do not agree with any terms in the agreement, you should stop access and use immediately.
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. Definition
2. How do we collect and use your personal information
3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we protect and save your personal information
5. Your rights
6. Protection of minors
7. How to update this policy
8. How to contact us
1. Definition
Personal information: Refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information with other information alone or with other information.
For personal information referred to this privacy protection policy, please see the types of "how do we collect and use your personal information".

Personal sensitive information: Refers to personal information such as leakage, illegal provision or abuse that may endanger people's body and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information such as personal reputation, physical and mental health damage or discrimination.

Personal sensitive information involved in this privacy protection policy includes: network identification information (including account names, account nicknames, and passwords related to the aforementioned);
Other information (mobile phone number, location information).

For the above personal sensitive information listed in this privacy protection policy, in order to facilitate your alertness when reading, in addition to the definition and listing here, we will still use the fonts in this privacy protection policy.Coupled with the line, or point out the way to display it alone, prompt you to pay attention.
2. How do we collect and use your personal information

In the process of APP development and upgrading, we will continue to improve the product function. We will only collect and use your personal information for the following goals described in this policy:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) Help you register as our user

To help you become our user, that is, the creation of the account can be completed so that we can provide you with a registered user service. We provide you with a variety of registered channels for you to choose from.

When you choose to register with your mobile phone number, you need to provide us with your personal sensitive information of your mobile phone number. We use this type of information to send the verification code information to submit whether to submit the verification identity.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You need to provide us with personal sensitive information of your mobile phone number. We use this type of information to send the verification code information to submit whether you are valid.

text: When you choose to use a third -party account (eg: WeChat) to register and log in to the user account more conveniently, we will access and collect your personal information after indirectly obtained.Class information, which is subject to the public information and permissions authorized by different third -party accounts) and binds your third -party account with your registered account.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you choose to register and log in to the user account more conveniently with a third -party account (eg, WeChat), we will access and collect your personal information after indirectly obtained.

text: If you refuse to provide information under a third -party account, you cannot choose to register and log in to use a third -party account. We promise the legitimacy of the third -party account channel source of this type of personal information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide information under a third -party account, you cannot choose to register and log in to use a third -party account. We promise the legitimacy of the third -party account channel source of this type of personal information.

text: (2) Equipment permissions we will use

1., we need to read your mobile phone status, use the purpose and business scenario: read the mobile phone status, involves IMEI information of user equipment, for user data statistics (installation, activity) and identifying users, and ensuring you to ensure yourAccounts, networks, operations and system security reduce the risk of numbers.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need to read your mobile phone status, purpose and business scenario.

text: The collection of your information is: hardware serial number, MAC address of the device, and the only device identification code (IMEI, OAID, AndroidId, IDFA, IDFV, UUID, Open UDID, UDID, AID, CAID, GUID, SIM card IMSI IMSI information))
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2., we need to obtain the software installation list information of your mobile phone, to determine whether there are WeChat and Alipay when you need to adjust WeChat or Alipay;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We need to get the software installation list information of your mobile phone.

text: If you do not authorize this permissions, some functions and related services of this product will not be used;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not authorize this permissions, some functions and related services of this product will not be used.

text: After authorizing this permissions, you can also cancel the authorization at the application permission management center of the mobile phone at any time.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: After authorizing this permissions, you can also cancel the authorization at the application permission management center of the mobile phone at any time.

Important

text: (3) Improve our products or services

We may also obtain your other information to improve the reasonable needs of our products or services, including the relevant feedback information provided by you when contacting the customer service, the questionnaire answering information sent to us during the questionnaire survey, and you and usWhen the related parties and our partners are interacted, we authorize the relevant information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may also obtain your other information to improve the reasonable needs of our products or services.

text: For information collected from your various devices, we may associate them so that we can provide you with consistent services on these devices.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: For information collected from your various devices, we may associate them so that we can provide you with consistent services on these devices.

text: We may combine information from a certain service with other services to provide you with services.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may combine information from a certain service with other services to provide you with services.

text: (4) Provide you with security guarantee

In order to improve the security of your service, protect the safety of personal property of you, other users or the public, be exempted from infringement, and better prevent security risks such as fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, cyber attacks, network invasion, etc.To accurately identify the rules that violate laws and regulations or the relevant agreement of the company, we may use or integrate your registered information, equipment information, network logs, and the frequency of your application, the collapse data, the overall installation usage, performance data, and performance data, andFor the source of the application, to comprehensively judge your account and transaction risk, conduct authentication, test and prevent security incidents, and take necessary records, audit, analysis, and disposal measures in accordance with the law.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may use or integrate your registered information, equipment information, network logs, and the frequency of your application, the collapse data, the overall installation usage, performance data, and the source of the application to comprehensively judge your account and transaction riskEssence

text: For example, we will comprehensively analyze the abnormalities of user account activity, multi -end login, and abnormal traffic to protect your account security.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will comprehensively analyze the abnormal user account activity, multi -end login, and abnormal traffic to protect your account security.

text: (5) Other purposes and uses

In the following circumstances, we will solicit your consent in advance in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations: 1. We use information for other purposes and purposes that are not stated in this policy;
label: Usage
Data Security

text: 2. We use the information collected based on specific uses for other uses.
label: Data Security

text: (6) Exception of obtaining authorization consent
According to relevant laws and regulations, collecting your personal information in the following circumstances does not need to obtain your authorization consent:

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you collect personal information from the legal disclosure information, you do not need to ask for consent.

text: 7. Signing the contract for the contract according to your requirements;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collecting the personal information necessary for the signing of the contract does not need to ask for consent.

text: 8. It is necessary to maintain the safe and stable operation of the products or services provided by maintenance, such as the failure of discovering and disposing of products or services;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collecting the personal information necessary for the safe and stable operation of the products or services provided by the maintenance, no consent is required.

text: 9. It is necessary for legal news reports;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collecting the personal information necessary for legal news reports does not need to solicit consent.

text: 10. Academic research institutions need to carry out statistics or academic research in the institute based on public interests, and provide academic research or description results to identify the personal information contained in the results;
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: 11. Other circumstances stipulated in laws and regulations.
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: 3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
(1) Sharing and disclosure
We will not share your personal information to any company, organization and individual other than the company, except the following situations: except:
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We will not share your personal information to any company, organization and individual other than the company, except the following situations: except:

text: 1. Share it if obtained the clear consent or authorization of you (and guardian) or you take the initiative.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Share personal information with your clear consent or authorization of you (and guardian) or actively choosing.

text: 2. Sharing in statutory situations.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: We may share your personal information to the outside world in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, litigation disputes, or in accordance with the requirements of administrative and judicial organs in accordance with law.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We may share your personal information to the outside world in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, litigation disputes, or in accordance with the requirements of administrative and judicial organs in accordance with law.

text: For example, if we determine that you have violated laws and regulations or seriously violated the rules of this agreement, or for the protection of personal property of the company's and its related companies or the public, we may disclose it in accordance with laws and regulations or platform -related agreement rules.Your personal information, including related violations and the measures we have taken.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: 3. Share your personal information from the affiliates of the APP.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: In this case, we will only share the necessary personal information and be subject to the purpose of the purpose declared in the privacy protection policy.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: If our affiliates want to change the purpose of personal information, we will solicit your authorization consent again.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Data Security

We send information to software service providers, smart equipment supply, system service providers and other partners (such as hardware manufacturers, telecommunications operators, map service providers, etc.) that support our business.Analyze the usage methods of our service, provide customer service, positioning services, or conduct academic research and investigation.

text: 4. How do we protect and save your personal information
(1) Technical protection:

In order to ensure your information security, we strive to take a variety of reasonable physical, electronics and management security measures that meet industry standards to protect your information, so that your information will not be leaked, damaged or lostSSL, information encryption storage, data center access control.
label: Data Security

text: We will use encryption technology to improve the security of personal information;
label: Data Security

text: We will use a trusted protection mechanism to prevent personal information from being maliciously attacked;
label: Data Security

text: We will deploy the access control mechanism to make every effort to ensure that only authorized personnel can access personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will deploy the access control mechanism to make every effort to ensure that only authorized personnel can access personal information.

text: (2) Security system guarantee:

We have the industry's advanced data security management system based on data -centered data and data security management systems around the data life cycle. From the aspects of organizational construction, system design, personnel management, product technology, and personal information security impact assessment, the security of the entire system is improved.
label: Data Security

text: At present, we have passed the third -level certification of information security level.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We have passed the third -level certification of information security level.

text: (3) Personnel safety management:

We have also adopted strict management of employees or outsourcing personnel who may contact you, including but not limited to adopting different permissions control according to different jobs, signing confidentiality agreements with them, monitoring their operations.
label: Data Security

text: We will provide corresponding security measures according to existing technologies to protect your information and provide reasonable security guarantees. We will try our best to make your information not be leaked, damaged or lost.
label: Data Security

text: We will organize safety and privacy protection training courses to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will organize safety and privacy protection training courses to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.

text: (4) Sensitive information and password protection tips:

1. Personal sensitive information protection: You voluntarily shared or even publicly shared information when using our service may involve personal information of you or others and even personal sensitive information.
label: Data Security

text: Please consider whether to share or even publicly share relevant information when using our services.
label: Data Security

text: 2. Please use complex passwords to help us guarantee your account security.
label: Data Security

text: We will try our best to ensure the security of any information you send to us.
label: Data Security

text: If our physical, technical, or management protection facilities are damaged, the information is caused by unauthorized access, public disclosure, tampering or destruction, which will cause your legitimate rights and interests to be damaged, and we will bear the corresponding legal responsibility.
label: Data Security

text: 3. Your account has a security protection function, please keep your account and password information properly.
label: Data Security

text: We will ensure that your information is not lost and will not be abused and altered by backup security measures such as backup and encryption of user passwords.
label: Data Security

text: Although there are aforementioned security measures, please also understand that there are no "perfect security measures" on the information network.
label: Data Security

text: 4. Information disclosure prompts and password leak processing: Please pay attention to the Internet is not an absolutely secure environment.
label: Data Security

text: We will try our best to ensure the security of any information you send to us.
label: Data Security

text: Please protect your personal information properly and provide them with others only.
label: Data Security

text: If you find your personal information leakage, especially your account and password leak, please contact our customer service immediately so that we can take corresponding measures.
label: Data Security

text: (5) Information security incident processing

After unfortunately a personal information security incident, we will inform you in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of the security incident, the disposal measures we have taken or we will take, the suggestions that you can prevent and reduce the risk,Remedy for your remedy.
label: Important
Data Security
